strings.string: What icon to show when there are notifications
Under what charge level to show a low battery warning
How much bigger the virtual clock should be in percent
Where the center of the spotlight should be. 0 is the center of the clock, 100 is the edge of the clock
Where numerals should be positioned. 0 is the center of the clock, 100 is the edge of the clock
Whether or not to show the numbers for the hours
Whether or not to show the numbers for the hours when the watch is in low power mode. Caution, the numbers tend to trigger burn-in protection more, which will turn off the display completely.
Font used for numbers. Some might break things on older watches.
Normal size number only Connect IQ font
Medium size number only Connect IQ font
Large size number only Connect IQ font
Huge size number only Connect IQ font
Normal size number only system font
Medium size number only system font
Large size number only system font
Huge size number only system font
Text color for numerals, in RRGGBB hexadecimal form. 000000 is black, FFFFFF is white, 5F0000 is dark red.
Text color for numerals when the watch is in low power mode, in RRGGBB hexadecimal form. 000000 is black, FFFFFF is white, 5F0000 is dark red.
Whether to use roman or arabic numerals. Roman will not work with number only fonts.

Color of the dial, in RRGGBB hexadecimal form. Do not use light colors on an OLED watch, it might trigger the burn-in protection as well as eat your battery alive. 000000 is black, FFFFFF is white, 5F0000 is dark red.
Low power background color (disabled on OLED watches)
Color of the dial when the watch is in low power mode, in RRGGBB hexadecimal form. This option is disabled on OLED watches. 000000 is black, FFFFFF is white, 5F0000 is dark red.
Color of hash marks in the rim of the dial, in RRGGBB hexadecimal form. 000000 is black, FFFFFF is white, 5F0000 is dark red.
Color of the line corresponding with the hour hand, in RRGGBB hexadecimal form. 000000 is black, FFFFFF is white, 5F0000 is dark red.
Color of the hash marks when the watch is in low power mode, in RRGGBB hexadecimal form. 000000 is black, FFFFFF is white, 5F0000 is dark red.
Color of the hour line when the watch is in low power mode, in RRGGBB hexadecimal form. 000000 is black, FFFFFF is white, 5F0000 is dark red.
Length is a percentage of the virtual clock diameter
Length is a percentage of the virtual clock diameter
Length is a percentage of the virtual clock diameter
Ignore low power mode (disabled on OLED watches)
Ignore the low power mode and use the settings for normal mode. This option is disabled for OLED screens.
